text_en: 826 Clinical Descriptions and Diagnostic Requirements for ICD-11 Mental, Behavioural or Neurodevelopmental Disorders Tunisia Site: Razi Psychiatric Hospital Site director: Majda Cheour Site coordinator: Rahma Damak United States Site: Department of Psychiatry, Columbia University Site directors: T.
